End.Body: So, yeah... It turns out a metaphysical concept whose whole MO is killing people is kinda a garbage date. Major yikes! Kinda cringe! You're not sure why you didn't suspect as much sooner, but hey, you win some- you lose some; at least you got a cute cat out of it- oh yeah the cat's fine btw.

Void2.Body: Death: *Scoffs* Pronouns? What a funny joke! Hats off to you mortal! Moreover, this puts me in the mind of an Andrew Tate lecture I watched- certainly you're familiar?

Void1.Body: You: Name's Dee, Big Boy~. Oh, and it's cool cuz I didn't tell you, but I don't super like being called mister- my pronouns are-

Void.Body: Death: Mortal. For your crimes against life itself- oh, it's you. I appreciate your willingness to call me at work- uh- Mr. Erie was it? Sorry for the hasle.

Preamble.Body: You: *Yawning sounds* ... *More yawning* ... *Have you watched Yawn of the Dead? I hear it's really good* ... *yawn*

Prologue.Body: You: Oh! What's this?! Today's the day I set up that Date with Death! I'm so excited- he's so hot and slay and stuff. The hitch is: to get ready I gotta commit a crime against life itself- which is weird, but ignoring any and all red flags- seems easy enough for someone like me!

Prologue1.Body: You: If I remember my highschool physics, I can whip up a DIY teslatron and make Schrodinger's cat- which, as everyone knows, is the most easily-made, extra-real life-crime you can commit, and not just a thought experiment. Yup! Anyway, where to start...?

Bedroom.Body: You are in your bedroom. It's got a bed in it and it does loosely meet the description of a room. (If you're ever stuck, try clicking on things around the room or items in your inventory- like doors to navigate... Or don't... I'm not your dad.)

Require: House Keys
You: I probably shouldn't. Despite the ingeniousness and good clean fun of self-defenestration, I don't have my house keys on me.
Rat Poison

You: Blueprints on how to make a that cat thing I mentioned. Superconductor, Low-Noise environment, Cat sealed in a cylinder- It looks like I need awful lot of stuff for something that's basically flipping a coin blindfolded, but I'm sure I'll just find it all laying around.
Atom with Spin

You: Blueprints on how to make a that cat thing I mentioned. Superconductor, Low-Noise environment, Cat sealed in a cylinder- It looks like I need awful lot of stuff for something that's basically flipping a coin blindfolded, but I'm sure I'll just find it all laying around.

Washroom.Body: You enter the washroom. These are very common in Canada- the place you live- this game takes place in Canada.

Living Room.Body: This is your living room. Maybe, after today, you should call it a "dying room?" Haha! Ammirite...? Actually no, because that'd be stupid.

Require: Extension Cable

You: There's nothing good on anymore, just violence in movies and s- Wait! This is a how-to series on supercoductor creation and maintenance! How convenient! Seems like the secret is a normal conductor but cold...
Ice Ice Baby

You: There's nothing good on anymore, just violence in movies and s- Wait! This is a how-to series on supercoductor creation and maintenance! How convenient! Seems like the secret is a normal conductor but cold...
Dryer Lint
Thanks to the set pattern these shredders cut paper in, sensitive documents are usually trivial to reassemble! Nonetheless, it's perfect for ripping things into smaller pieces.

Kitchen.Body: Ah yes, the kitchen. A place of dinning and socratic questions such as "Why do they call it an oven when you of in cold food?" Truely a place of majesty.

Require: House Keys
You: I'd love to go outside, but I don't have my keys and I lied I wouldn't love to go outside.
Water Tray
You: I could put something in here if I wanted to make it colder, but it can only fit a small tray roughly the size of 12 icecubes.
Bucket Cat
You: "Every action has an equal and opposite reaction." Mark Twain said that.
Lid
You: "Every action has an equal and opposite reaction." Mark Twain said that.
You: A device specifically designed to open things! Ironically, I've never needed to use it.

Alley.Body: This is the alley way outside your house. It wasn't this messy- was it? You can't really say; you don't get out much.

Require: Sardines
You: This cat doesn't find me interesting or friendly, probably because I intend to throw physics at it untill it dies and lives simultaneously. Rude! Maybe if I had some cat treats or something...
Oven Mitts
You: OW! It scratched my hand! Ok so, note to self: it's a bad idea to go up to random stray cats and grab them... That like really hurt... I can taste the ring worm.
Bucket
You: Me when I freaking get you! Er- Hm I guess I didn't think this through cuz I don't have a cylindrical containment cell... I'll just put you back then.
Ice Tray
You: Oh hey. A puddle. Wow!
